about_the_game:
Karl Heinz Schneider is now available as a new playable character in Captain Tsubasa: Rise of New Champions.

*You will not receive the character directly. They are earned by completing 3 missions in the DLC story.
detailed_description:
Karl Heinz Schneider is now available as a new playable character in Captain Tsubasa: Rise of New Champions.

*You will not receive the character directly. They are earned by completing 3 missions in the DLC story.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-650 | AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTS 450, 1 GB | AMD Radeon HD 6970, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 37 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
pc_requirements.recommended:

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 | AMD Ryzen 3 1300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 750 Ti, 2 GB | AMD Radeon HD 7870, 2 GB
